entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
